#summary Intra and distortion infos about the camera

This wiki page is not the API documentation. Indeed, Doxygen will do it for us. It's only for sharing ideas...

= Role =

This class represent the physical device which take the pictures. It is not related to a 3D position (see [FieldOfView]). This class owns a vector of FieldOfView which can be used to estimate the different parameters.
